articles.author: Michael E. Miller
articles.title: For Charles’s first visit as king, Australians are royally unimpressed - The Washington Post
articles.description: King Charles III is set to make his longest trip abroad since starting cancer treatment, but Australians are not exactly excited about his imminent arrival.
articles.content:
SYDNEY When King Charles III arrives in Australia on Friday, hell receive rock star treatment just not in the way he might have hoped.
Instead of drawing the massive crowds that often awaited his mo… [+6533 chars]
